definition: see 亦步亦趨|亦步亦趋[yi4 bu4 yi4 qu1]
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
surname Bu
a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to hasten/to hurry/to walk fast/to approach/to tend towards/to converge
to blindly follow suit (idiom)/to imitate slavishly/to do what everyone else is doing
small quick steps
to walk unsteadily/to stagger/to lurch/to hobble/to totter
gait/to walk
to walk cautiously in order not to make noise
swaggering/staggering/waddling
to step forward/to walk
a slow march

very slow
to bow/to bend at the waist
leisurely/unhurried/sluggish
at a slow pace
